top_problem_solved: This is a story about a married woman whose health was always deteriorating. Her family members got her birth chart analyzed, and after seeing it, it seemed like something was off. It seemed like there was some kind of spirit or entity involved. We told her to be careful, and initially, she was fine. When her first son was born, everything was okay because she was always close to her husband. But when her second son was born, he would sleep between his parents, and that's when the lady's behavior changed. She couldn't tolerate it, and one day, she got angry and picked up a knife to attack him. Luckily, her husband intervened and jumped in to stop her. After that, they realized that something was seriously wrong. They discovered that she had been possessed by a spirit during her marriage, and that's why she was behaving strangely. To cure her, we performed some remedies, and now she's normal. It's shocking to think that for seven years after her marriage, her husband had no idea what was going on. It was a terrifying experience for him. We deal with these kinds of issues, and this story is a good example of that.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is when I had the privilege of sitting on the Gold Club Members' Panel. It was a resounding success, and I'm proud to have achieved this milestone in BNI. This experience not only showcased my expertise but also demonstrated the power of networking and collaboration within the BNI community. I'm grateful for the opportunities BNI has provided me, and I look forward to continuing to grow and contribute to the organization.

name: Kiran Kumar G
top_product: Our top product is our complete Diesel Generator Solution, where we manage everything end-to-end capacity assessment, site inspection, DG supply and placement, AMF panel integration, cabling, and full commissioning. What makes us different is our hands-on technical expertise and attention to detail. We don’t just deliver a generator; we deliver a reliable power solution tailored to the client’s exact requirements.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a business or project that requires a dependable power backup system or wants to upgrade their existing generator setup. This includes apartments, hospitals, manufacturing units, warehouses, commercial buildings, hotels, schools, and infrastructure projects. Anyone planning a new DG installation, resolving frequent power failures, or looking for long-term maintenance support is an excellent match for our services.
top_problem_solved: One of the most challenging problems we solved was for a client who needed a DG installed in a very tight and complicated location. The site had an electrical pole blocking the entry, minimal space, and almost no ventilation. Despite these constraints, we designed an alternative layout, executed precise placement, and completed the installation safely and successfully. To make the installation possible, we coordinated the removal and repositioning of the pole, planned the DG placement carefully, and installed proper exhaust piping to ensure safe ventilation. We handled all the groundwork, multiple visits, technical adjustments, and the complete commissioning — even though the project demanded far more effort and resources than expected. What mattered most to us was delivering the solution exactly the way the customer needed it. The client was extremely happy with the final result, and this project reinforced our belief that going the extra mile creates trust, long-term relationships, and genuine value.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable experiences was a recent project referred through our network for a customer. Even though the site conditions were challenging and required multiple visits, we made sure to understand the client’s exact needs and execute everything with precision. We personally inspected the location several times, coordinated with the client, guided them on technical requirements, and completed all the groundwork to ensure the generator was installed safely and positioned perfectly for smooth operation. What stood out to me was the customer’s appreciation not just for the product, but for the commitment, patience, and professionalism we showed throughout the process. It reminded me why BNI referrals matter: they connect us to people who value sincere effort, reliability, and long-term service. Every time a BNI member or their referral trusts us with their power needs, we make sure they receive the best possible support, without compromise

It’s a beautiful reminder of how BNI connections often grow into long-term professional relationships built on trust. 2. A member from BNI Olympus, Gujarat reached out to me through BNI Connect to design a doodle-style cover page for Hello Magazine. The very first sample draft was loved by the entire team. Although a tight timeline meant they had to move ahead with another concept, the experience remains special to me, it showed how quickly trust can be built and how ideas can resonate when the right people connect. 3. Through BNI, I got the opportunity to explore the world of wallpapers and laminates, understanding a completely new segment and the true power of collaboration. It expanded my creative perspective and reinforced how BNI opens doors to learning beyond our core industries.
